trans-unit.source: Specifies the appearance, text formatting, and behavior of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control column.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 控件列的外观、文本格式和行为。

trans-unit.source: This class is abstract.
trans-unit.target: 此类为抽象类。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects (the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象 ( <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) 通过访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control automatically creates a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects for you when you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> property to an appropriate data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件自动创建的集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象为你设置时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>到适当的数据源的属性。

trans-unit.source: The objects created actually are instances of one of the following classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建的对象实际上是继承自的以下类之一的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>:<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>类。

trans-unit.source: To format the data display, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> class to one of the formatting values.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置格式的数据显示，请设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>为格式设置的值之一的类。

trans-unit.source: For more information about valid formatting values, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关有效格式设置的值的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also create your own set of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以创建自己的集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象，并将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: When you do so, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> of each column style to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> to synchronize the display of columns with the actual data.
trans-unit.target: 执行此操作时，必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>到每个列样式的<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>与实际的数据同步显示列的显示。

trans-unit.source: Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 始终创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象，并将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>之前添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: 当你将添加一个空<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>使用一个有效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>到集合中，值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>自动为你生成的对象。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试添加新因此，将引发异常<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象具有重复<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>值复制到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: When one of the derived classes is instantiated by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control, the class created depends on the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> object.
trans-unit.target: 当派生类之一通过实例化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件，创建的类取决于<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>与关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> with its <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> set to `System.Boolean` will be associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>与其<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A>设置为`System.Boolean`将与关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>。

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, use the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定的任何类型<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>，使用<xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To create your own column classes, you can inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建您自己的列类，可以继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>。

trans-unit.source: You might want to do this in order to create special columns that host controls, as exemplified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> class, which hosts the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可能想要这样做以便在创建主机控件的特殊列，即为例证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>类，哪些主机<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can host an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> control to show pictures in columns, or you can create your own user control to host in the column.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以承载<xref:System.Drawing.Image>控件以显示在列中，图片或在列中，可以创建您自己的用户控件到主机。

trans-unit.source: The functionality of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> shouldn't be confused with that of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>不应将其与的混淆<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>。

trans-unit.source: Whereas the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> contains the properties and methods appropriate to creating a data table's schema, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> contains the properties and methods related to the appearance of an individual column on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 而<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>包含的属性和方法适用于创建数据表的架构，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>包含的属性和方法与在屏幕上的单个列的外观。

trans-unit.source: If a row contains a <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the text displayed in the column can be set with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果某一行包含<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>，列中显示的文本可以设置与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> class also allows you to specify the behavior of a column while its data is being changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>类还允许你指定的列的行为，同时正在改变其数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A> methods temporarily suspend the drawing of the column while large updates are being made to the column's data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A>方法暂时挂起列的绘制到列的数据进行大规模更新时。

trans-unit.source: Without this functionality, every change in every cell of the grid would be immediately drawn; this could be distracting to the user and a performance liability.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有此功能，每个单元格的网格中的每个更改将立即绘制;这可能是让人分散注意力向用户和性能责任。

trans-unit.source: Several methods allow monitoring of the column as it is edited by the user, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A> events.
trans-unit.target: 有多种方法允许用户编辑列的监视包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A>事件。

trans-unit.source: Most of the properties and methods of the class are tailored to controlling a column's appearance.
trans-unit.target: 大部分属性和类的方法适用于控制列的外观。

trans-unit.source: But a few, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A> allow you to examine and change the value in a specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 但几个，如一样<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A>可用于检查和更改中指定的单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> that hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>承载<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控件。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />, you must override the following members: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Abort(System.Int32)" />, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit(System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager,System.Int32)" />, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit(System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Boolean)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager,System.Int32)" /> (twice).
trans-unit.target: 继承自<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />，必须重写以下成员： <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Abort(System.Int32)" />， <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit(System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager,System.Int32)" />， <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit(System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Boolean)" />，和<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager,System.Int32)" />（两次）。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: In a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, the following properties are initialized.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>，下列属性进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Default value
trans-unit.target: 默认值

trans-unit.source: The string "(null)"
trans-unit.target: 字符串"(null)"

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> that provides the attributes for the column.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />，它提供列的特性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: To create a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, you must first get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for the data source of the table to which the column will be added.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>，则必须先获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>的数据源的列将添加到表。

trans-unit.source: See the `CurrencyManager` and `BindingManager` for details on getting specific `CurrencyManager` objects for a form.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅`CurrencyManager`和`BindingManager`有关获取特定详细信息`CurrencyManager`窗体的对象。

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, you can then get the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> that will supply the data for the column.
trans-unit.target: 从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>，然后就可以获取<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>为<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>，将提供的列的数据。

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, the following read/write properties are initialized.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>，以下的读/写属性进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Initial value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: "(null)"
trans-unit.target: "(null)"

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> (derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>) and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>(派生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>) 并将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>。

trans-unit.source: The row number upon which an operation is being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 在其上中断操作的行的行号。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initiates a request to interrupt an edit procedure.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中被重写时，将启动一个请求来中断编辑过程。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Abort%2A> method is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Abort%2A>方法由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>方法返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the column value is rolled back to its previous value.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，列值将回滚到以前的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> must end any editing operations before returning.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>在返回之前必须结束所有编辑操作。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Abort%2A> method to accomplish this.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Abort%2A>方法来实现此目的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndEdit%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control indirectly invokes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Abort%2A> if its `ShouldAbort` parameter is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndEdit%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件间接调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Abort%2A>如果其`ShouldAbort`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of text in a column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置列中文本的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Left" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="Left" />。

trans-unit.source: Valid options include <see langword="Left" />, <see langword="Center" />, and <see langword="Right" />.
trans-unit.target: 有效选项包括 <see langword="Left" />、<see langword="Center" /> 和 <see langword="Right" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment%2A> property for each column in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> to `HorizontalAlignment.Center` if the data isn't a string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment%2A>属性中的每列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>到`HorizontalAlignment.Center`如果数据不是字符串。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment" /> 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: Suspends the painting of the column until the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 一直挂起列的绘制，直到调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate" /> 方法为止。

trans-unit.source: When many changes are made to the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control (whether the changes are in the attributes of the column or the data displayed by the control), you should invoke the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A> method to temporarily freeze the drawing of the control.
trans-unit.target: 当的外观进行了大量更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件 （是否正在更改列或由控件显示的数据的特性），应调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A>方法来暂时冻结控件的绘制。

trans-unit.source: This results in less distraction to the user, and a performance gain.
trans-unit.target: 这会导致更少受干扰到用户，并且提高性能。

trans-unit.source: After all updates have been made, invoke the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A> method to resume drawing of the control.
trans-unit.target: 所有更新之后，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A>方法来恢复的控件的绘制。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />。

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> does not have a valid data source, or if this column is not mapped to a valid property in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 没有有效数据源，或该列未映射到数据源中的有效属性，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for a data source and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.CheckValidDataSource%2A> to determine if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> is valid.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>为数据源和使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.CheckValidDataSource%2A>以确定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>有效。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> for this column is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该列的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that hosted by the column.
trans-unit.target: 由列承载的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: Informs the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> that the user has begun editing the column.
trans-unit.target: 通知 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 用户已开始编辑该列。

trans-unit.source: When called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A> method allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control to show a pencil in the row header indicating the row is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 调用时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A>方法允许<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件以显示正在编辑铅笔，该值指示行的行标题中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of the row being edited.
trans-unit.target: 所编辑行的行号。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initiates a request to complete an editing procedure.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中被重写时，将启动一个请求来完成编辑过程。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the editing procedure committed successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果编辑过程成功提交，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a possible override of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示可能重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A> method, and then sets a variable that allows other functions to determine whether the column is still in edit more.
trans-unit.target: 该代码时，将调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A>方法，，然后选择允许其他函数来确定列是否仍在的变量更编辑的设置。

trans-unit.source: The code then calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Invalidate%2A> method to redraw the control.
trans-unit.target: 然后，代码调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Invalidate%2A>方法进行重绘控件。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the function returns `true` to indicate the change has been committed.
trans-unit.target: 最后，该函数返回`true`以指示已提交更改。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit(System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager,System.Int32)" /> method should be used by classes derived from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> class to reset their editing state, for example, to concede the focus if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> hosts an editing control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit(System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager,System.Int32)" />方法应由派生自的类<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />类中重置其编辑状态，例如，可以放弃焦点，如果<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />承载的编辑控件。

trans-unit.target: 请参阅<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ConcedeFocus" />方法。

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible without error, return <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Resumes the painting of columns suspended by calling the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 继续绘制由调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate" /> 方法而挂起的列。

trans-unit.source: When many changes are made to the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control (whether the changes are in the attributes of the column or the data displayed by the control), you should invoke the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A> method to temporarily freeze the drawing of the control.
trans-unit.target: 当的外观进行了大量更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件 （是否正在更改列或由控件显示的数据的特性），应调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A>方法来暂时冻结控件的绘制。

trans-unit.source: This results in less distraction to the user, and a performance gain.
trans-unit.target: 这会导致更少受干扰到用户，并且提高性能。

trans-unit.source: After all updates have been made, invoke the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A> method to resume drawing of the control.
trans-unit.target: 所有更新之后，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A>方法来恢复的控件的绘制。

trans-unit.source: Make a column read-only if it contains a primary key or if its value is generated automatically (as when the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> object's <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> property is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: 使列成为只读上，如果它包含一个主键或其值自动生成 (比如<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>对象的<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>属性设置为`true`)。

trans-unit.source: Similar read-only properties exist on other classes, each allowing more control over the access to data.
trans-unit.target: 类似的只读属性存在于其他类中，每个允许更好地控制对数据的访问。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control can be set to read-only mode by using its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ReadOnly%2A> property; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> also has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> class has a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> property for restricting data updates.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件可通过使用设置为只读模式其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ReadOnly%2A>属性;<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>还有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A>属性，与<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>类具有<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>限制数据更新的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A> property to the same value as the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> object's <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A>到相同的值的属性<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>对象的<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly" /> 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Allows the column to free resources when the control it hosts is not needed.
trans-unit.target: 不再需要列所承载的控件时，允许列释放资源。

trans-unit.source: If you create a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, you will often use the derived class to host a control that is used to edit data.
trans-unit.target: 如果你创建一个派生自的类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>，你通常将使用派生的类来承载控件用于编辑数据。

trans-unit.source: You should override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReleaseHostedControl%2A> method to release any references to the control in order to free system resources.
trans-unit.target: 应重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReleaseHostedControl%2A>方法来释放对该控件的任何引用，以释放系统资源。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> derived class uses this method to release the reference to the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>派生的类使用此方法来释放所承载的引用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: Resets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText" /> to its default value, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText" /> 重置为其默认值 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method if you are either creating a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or creating your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你创建的设计器通常使用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或创建你自己的控件、 包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
